articles.title: Fed Holds Rates Steady, Signals Patience on Future Cuts
articles.summary: The Federal Reserve held interest rates unchanged at its latest meeting, signaling a cautious approach to future rate adjustments.

articles.title: Markets Rally as Fed Maintains Dovish Tone
articles.summary: US equity markets gained following the Federal Reserve's decision to hold rates, with the S&P 500 rising 0.8%.

articles.title: Analysis: What the Fed's Rate Decision Means for Bond Investors
articles.summary: Bond yields fell as investors digested the Fed's latest policy statement and its implications for fixed income markets.
